tutorial_title_1: Every Pocket Bank wallet has a unique Backup Phrase
tutorial_title_2: Anyone with a copy if your backup Phrase can spend your funds
tutorial_title_3: Don't store your Backup Phrase digitally
tutorial_message_1: Your backup phrase are 12 random words that act as a tool to recover and access your wallet at ant time, even if you lose your password
tutorial_message_2: Never share your backup phrase and store it offline in a secure place
tutorial_message_3: The best thing to do is to a pen and a piece of paper and physically write it down
unlock_message: Insert your password to access your phrase
backup_phrase_message:
This is your wallet's backup Phrase
Write the following words in order and keep a copy in a secure location
restore_message:
Type the {{amount}} words of your "backup phrase"
Use space as separator,the order is mandatory
restore_password_message: Set a password to control the access to yout wallet
create_message: Pocket Bank does not hold your keys and cannot recover your password
invalid_password_length: The password must be at least 4 characters long
invalid_repassword_match: Your password and confirmation password do not match.
receive_message:
Only deposit {{currency}} ({{symbol}}) to the address
 Sending any other digital asset could result in permanent loss
amount_is_too_large: Max amount cannot be larger than {{amount}}
